          <title>
            <string language="en">Warning labels</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Warnende Kennsätze</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Étiquettes d'avertissement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Etiquetas de advertência</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Contrassegni di pericolo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ετικέτες προειδοποίησης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Escrituras de la etiqueta amonestadoras</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the warning labels found in bottles of harmful (left), corrosive (middle) and irritant (right) substances.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Chemicals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Corrosive</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">warning labels</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die warnenden Kennsätze, 
die in den Flaschen schädlichen gefunden werden (link), ätzenden 
(mittlere) und Reiz (rechten) Substanzen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les étiquettes 
d'avertissement trouvées dans des bouteilles de substances (droites) 
nocives (gauche), corrosives (moyen) et irritantes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra as etiquetas de 
advertência encontradas em uns frascos de substâncias (direitas) 
prejudiciais (esquerdo), corrosivas (médio) e irritant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra i contrassegni di 
pericolo trovati in bottiglie delle sostanze (di destra) nocive (di 
sinistra), corrosive (centrale) ed irritanti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ετικέτες προειδοποίησης 
που βρίσκονται στα μπουκάλια των επιβλαβών (αριστερός), 
διαβρωτικών (μέση) και ερεθιστικών (δεξιά) ουσιών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra las escrituras de la 
etiqueta amonestadoras encontradas en las botellas de sustancias 
(derechas) dañosas (izquierdo), corrosivas (medio) e irritantes.</string>
          </description>
